mapper.insert: insert into report(member_id, item_idx, report_content, report_date) values(#{member_id}, #{item_idx}, #{report_content}, now())
insert into report(member_id, shop_member_id, report_content, report_date) values(#{member_id}, #{shop_member_id}, #{report_content}, now())
insert into report(member_id, shopReview_idx, report_content, report_date) values(#{member_id}, #{shopReview_idx}, #{report_content}, now())
